name: io.github.tofunori/mcp-image-scientific
description: MCP server for publication-quality scientific figures â€” diagrams, charts, and maps with built-in QA validation. Powered by Gemini 2.0 Flash Image.

environmentVariables.name: GEMINI_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Google Gemini API key for image generation (get from https://aistudio.google.com/apikey)

environmentVariables.name: IMAGE_OUTPUT_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Absolute path to directory where generated images will be saved (defaults to ./output)

environmentVariables.name: SKIP_PROMPT_ENHANCEMENT
environmentVariables.description: Set to 'true' to disable automatic prompt optimization and use direct prompts

environmentVariables.name: SCIENTIFIC_QA_ENABLED
environmentVariables.description: Set to 'true' to enable post-generation QA validation for scientific figures (off by default)

environmentVariables.name: SCIENTIFIC_QA_MAX_RETRIES
environmentVariables.description: Maximum number of retries when QA validation detects hard failures (default: 1)
